Question: Emma Healthcare Co,Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Emma Healthcare Co., Ltd.

Product: Multi Modal AI-based Digital Healthcare System

- CES 2024 Innovation Award Honoree
- Focus on digital healthcare with advanced medical engineering technology
- Recognized for AI technology products in response to demographic changes
- Third consecutive CES Innovation Award win (2022, 2023, 2024)
Summary_cn:
Emma医疗有限公司

产品: 多模态基于人工智能的数字医疗系统

- CES 2024创新奖得奖者
- 专注于数字医疗和先进的医学工程技术
- 在应对人口变化中的AI技术产品方面得到认可
- 连续第三次获得CES创新奖 (2022, 2023, 2024)
